about_me.en: I am Jiahao Lu, a M.S. student from Xiamen University, advised by Prof. Zhirong Shen. My current research interests include memory pooling/tiering (CXL/HBM) and reliability. My homepage is `https://lujhcoconut.github.io/` .
about_me.zh: 我是卢佳豪，来自厦门大学的硕士研究生，导师是沈志荣副教授。我目前的研究兴趣包括层级内存、池化内存以及内存可靠性。我的主页是`https://lujhcoconut.github.io/`。

zh.major: 软件工程，浙江师范大学
